descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Ride with friends or by yourself using Snowboard, Ski and more to come having full control in your hands! The gears, rails and snow physics feel realistic. Carve your way and compete on official and community created maps!

Featuring experimental level design elements like bowls, jumps, narrow and large trails, ice caves and totally crazy tracks. You can use Gravity Sketch to make your own!

Leave your mark by getting to the end of each track so other players can see your replay when they are playing. All players are competing for time, best tricks score, and coins collected! The best player's scores replays will auto play on all tracks!

- Full control using your hands as feet
- Grab your board to perform amazing tricks
- Realistic Snowboard and Ski physics, more gears soon
- Explore 45+ official maps plus 550+ community created maps
- Choose now from 6 Ready Player Me avatars and 5 Gear skins
- Race against other players replays
- Get fun competing with friends in multiplayer rooms
- Ranks for best time, tricks, coins collected
- Footage mode to capture your best runs from any angle
- Customize any map by changing the sun position and sky mood
- Wear goggles if you want to reduce motion sickness
- Use smooth turning if you want to play on your couch
- Find secret areas

Slowp is still in development! There are still many features and polishing that we want to add to the whole experience. Judge it with that in mind and please give us feedback!
